name: Adroit Resources, Inc.
title: Engineering Recruitment Manager
about: Experienced in sourcing and placing engineers in cutting-edge technology companies. With over a decade of experience in the industry, I have developed a keen eye for identifying top engineering talent and matching them with companies where they can thrive and make a significant impact. My passion lies in creating successful connections that drive innovation and growth.
WaysToAttractTopTalent: Targeted marketing for passive job seekers
Enhanced competitive benefits for our consultants
Specialties: IT Solutions and Services, Permanent Recruitment, Temporary Recruitment, Contract Recruitment, VMS/MSP Programs, Contract to Hire Placements, Contingent Workforce Supplier, SOW, and Cloud, UI, Java, DevOps, Release, QE
availability: Not actively seeking new clients at the moment.
